reviews.review: Best concept ever made, I love this game and I continue to do so.

陪伴我度过童年的游戏，终于补上了车票   ：）
黑山研究所，我回来了~

Half life 2
one of my favourite games
the way it tells its story is just amazing. you are always in control of your character 
through the wastes of city 17 to the run down prison of nova prospect to the massive citidel 
you fight your way through all the civil protection to fight for your freedom alongside some rebels
which can be quite annoying at times and can get in your way and fighting alongside Alyx 
the gunplay never feels repetitive as your always fighting in different environments 

I couldnt recommend this game anymore than i can this is a must buy for anyone with a pc especially with its cheap price tag  even on specials the level design is just amazing 

this is the game

Best game I ever played. Its story is really good and its really fun. Definitely recommended.
Cпустя 150 часов на лицухе и 50 на пиратке,прохождения на харде без смертей могу с увереностью сказать-рекомендую
Bestes Spiel aller Zeiten, ein Muss für jeden Gamer

The old legendary classic that will always make you urgent to play it again after some time. Good story, enemies, mechanics, combat, characters and map design. All three parts of this game are awesome to play with friends in cooperative mode, you can do that when you download Synergy mod.
This game cant be put in a category. Its category by itself.

A woderful game

我所玩的游戏时长，就是我通关所用时长。
玩的时候很害怕，因为一个人，因为有僵尸，氛围很抑郁。
但玩到最后就是一群人了，主角也逐渐无敌了。
感觉很棒！这是我真正玩通关的一款游戏

Tiene una buena campaña aunque si llega a ser un poco difícil y frustrante en algunas partes y más cuando intentas sacar algún logro, pero es muy entretenido, su historia es muy buena, hay contenido nuevo como vehículos, esas cosas que no se vieron en el primet half life, lo recomiendo mucho

Even 'till this day, one of the best single player shooters I've ever seen. Simply by having a good story, with good enough developed characters and by haivng a gameplay that constantly throws new entertaining gimmicks at you

Realmente Half-Life 2 sigue los pasos del 1 sumando cada vez mas a una historia increible, ademas de incorporar graficos y mecanicas mejores. Me encanto el mundo que presenta y los personas tan entrañables con los que uno se cruza e interactua, realmente atrapante y totalmente recomendable para aquellos seguidores de la franquisia, como tambien para aquellas personas que quieran divertirse un rato. Espero les guste y lo puedan disfrutar tanto como yo. Saludos!
Melhor jogo de todos os tempos.
A game that deserves a sequel.
Балдёжь игра, настоящий сюжет который поставит планку многим современам игрулям
Jue ga zo. Cómpralo, nada más que decir
Jeu a finir absolument, vraiment génial

So it's 2018 and this is the first time i get to play half life 2 and so far i enjoyed every second off it

класика кто не прошол тот должен!!
Замечательная игра тех времён я даже иногда воращаюсь в неё чтоб поиграть.
Хоть я и прошел полностью её в это году, она подарила мне назабываемые емоции, очень понравилась атмосфера игры
Simplesmente único, jogo sensacional e vale cada centavo, continuação de uma história sensacional. Agora quero o HL3.
Despiroque na ação frenetica de Half Life 2 na pele Gordon Freeman!!!!
